programme.title: The Hudsucker Proxy
programme.desc: A recent business school graduate ready to work his way up becomes involved in a board of directors' scheme.

programme.title: The Corruptor
programme.desc: A hard-hitting tale of deception, violence and betrayal in New York City's Chinatown.

programme.title: Tenacious D in The Pick of Destiny
programme.sub-title: Tenacious D in The Pick of Destiny
programme.desc: Musicians JB and KG set out on a quest for a legendary guitar pick.

programme.title: Imagine: John Lennon
programme.desc: A film documenting John Lennon's profound impact on the world via footage shot during Lennon's life.

programme.title: Jimi Hendrix
programme.desc: Family, friends, and rock legends present memories of the greatest rock guitarist of all time, Jimi Hendrix.

programme.title: Almost Heroes
programme.desc: To the pantheon of American heroes, two conquerors of the frontier can at last be added: Edwards and Hunt.

programme.title: Sesame Street Presents: Follow That Bird
programme.desc: Big Bird runs away and all his old buddies join in the search to find him. Will Big Bird return home?

programme.title: Best Friends
programme.desc: Goldie Hawn and Burt Reynolds star as two screenwriters who face chaos after meeting each other's families.

programme.title: Disorderlies
programme.desc: Three friends must save a wealthy, ailing curmudgeon from the morbid plans of the man's greedy nephew.

programme.title: Monkey Trouble
programme.desc: Eva Gregory really wants a pet and bonds with a charming monkey, who brings trouble along the way.

programme.title: Oh, God!
programme.desc: When God comes to Earth, he struggles to convince his chosen messenger about who he really is.

programme.title: Oh, God! Book II
programme.desc: God returns to Earth and recruits a student to help him devise an advertising campaign to spread his message.

programme.title: Oh, God! You Devil
programme.desc: A musician sells his soul to the Devil, as God and the Devil battle for the musician's soul.
